name: i Fishing 3
description:
iFishing 3 is the much improved sequel to the smash hit iFishing.

iFishing has over 20 million players worldwide and we thank you for your support since the game was launched. We took all your suggestions and improved the game in every area possible!

FEATURES

- 17 Full motion 720p video backgrounds
- Photorealistic graphics and with fish that kick and jump
- Compete in 50 tournaments in the new Career Mode
- Visit the Tackle Store to buy new lures, different rods, and line
- New spinning reel controls
- Scales better across phones and tablets
- More sound effects and speech from your guide


iFishing 3 is the perfect game to bring the great outdoors to you, no matter where you are.

For more great games visit www.RockingPocketGames.com
